item.Q:
Write the character:
1: good; well
2: to be fond of
item.A:
1: hǎo 2: hào
好的 hǎode (adj) OK 爱好 (愛好) àihào to like; to be fond of; to be keen on; interest; hobby

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: because of; for; to
2: as (in the capacity of); to take sth as; to act as; to serve as; to behave as; to become; to be; to do
item.A:
traditional: 為
1: wèi 2: wéi
因为 (因為) yīnwèi because; owing to; on account of 为了 (為了) wéile because of

item.Q:
Write the character:
on; on top; upon; first (of two parts); previous or last (week etc); upper; higher; above; previous; to climb; to go into; above; to go up; to attend (class or university); third tone of putonghua
item.A:
shàng
以上 yǐshàng more than; above; over; the above-mentioned

traditional: 來
lái
出来 (出來) chūlái to come out; to emerge

traditional: 學
xué
学习 (學習) xuéxí to learn; to study

item.Q:
Write the character:
at once; then; right away; only; (emphasis); to approach; to move towards; to undertake; already
item.A:
jiù
就是 jiùshì (emphasizes that something is precisely or exactly what is stated); precisely; exactly; even; if; just like; in the same way as

item.Q:
Write the character:
to deliver; to turn over; to make friends; to intersect (lines); to pay (money)
item.A:
jiāo
交换 (交換) jiāohuàn to exchange; to swap; (telecom) to switch; (math.) to commute; (math.) commutative

item.Q:
Write the character:
also; too; (in classical Chinese) final particle serving as copula
item.A:
yě
也是 yěshì also to be

yòng
作用 zuòyòng action; activity; actions; acts; effect; to play a role

item.Q:
Write the character:
can; may; capable; energy; able; surname
item.A:
néng
不能 bùnéng cannot; must not; should not

rú
如果 rúguǒ if; in case; in the event that

item.Q:
Write the character:
o'clock; time; when; hour; season; period; surname
item.A:
traditional: 時
shí
同时 (同時) tóngshí at the same time; simultaneously

item.Q:
Write the character:
language; culture; writing; formal; literary; gentle; surname
item.A:
wén
文化 wénhuà culture; civilization; cultural

item.Q:
Write the character:
to speak; to say; a theory (usually in compounds)
item.A:
traditional: 說
shuō
说明 (說明) shuōmíng to explain; to illustrate; explanation; directions; caption

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: (negative prefix for verbs); have not; not
2: drowned; to end; to die; to inundate
item.A:
traditional: 沒
1: méi 2: mò
没有 (沒有) méiyǒu haven't; hasn't; doesn't exist; to not have; to not be 没收 (沒收) mòshōu confiscate

tā
他们 (他們) tāmen they

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: it depends; think; to see; to look at
2: to look after; to take care of; to watch; to guard
item.A:
1: kàn 2: kān
看到 kàndào see (that); note 看出 kānchū to see

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: that; those
2: name
item.A:
1: nà 2: nā
那么 (那麼) nàme like that; in that way; or so; so; so very much; about; in that case 地拉那 dìlānā Tirana

traditional: 問
wèn
问题 (問題) wèntí question; problem; issue; topic

item.Q:
Write the character:
to be born; to give birth; life; to grow
item.A:
shēng
生产 (生產) shēngchǎn to produce; manufacture

item.Q:
Write the character: hǎo
(hǎode de hǎo)
item.A:
good; well
好的 hǎode (adj) OK

item.Q:

(àihào de hào)
item.A:
to be fond of
爱好 (愛好) àihào to like; to be fond of; to be keen on; interest; hobby

item.Q:
Write the character: wèi
(yīnwèi de wèi)
item.A:
traditional: 為
because of; for; to
因为 (因為) yīnwèi because; owing to; on account of

item.Q:
Write the character: wéi
(wéile de wéi)
item.A:
traditional: 為
as (in the capacity of); to take sth as; to act as; to serve as; to behave as; to become; to be; to do
为了 (為了) wéile because of

Write the character: shàng

item.A:
on; on top; upon; first (of two parts); previous or last (week etc); upper; higher; above; previous; to climb; to go into; above; to go up; to attend (class or university); third tone of putonghua

to come

就是 jiùshì (emphasizes that something is precisely or exactly what is stated); precisely; exactly; even; if; just like; in the same way as

item.A:
also; too; (in classical Chinese) final particle serving as copula

to use
作用 zuòyòng action; activity; actions; acts; effect; to play a role

item.Q:

item.A:
can; may; capable; energy; able; surname Neng
不能 bùnéng cannot; must not; should not

item.Q:

item.A:
as (if); such as
如果 rúguǒ if; in case; in the event that

item.A:
traditional: 時
o'clock; time; when; hour; season; period; surname Shi
同时 (同時) tóngshí at the same time; simultaneously

item.Q:
Write the character: wén
(wénhuà de wén)
item.A:
language; culture; writing; formal; literary; gentle; surname Wen
文化 wénhuà culture; civilization; cultural

item.Q:
Write the character: shuō
(shuōmíng de shuō)
item.A:
traditional: 說
to speak; to say; a theory (usually in compounds such as 日心说 heliocentric theory)
说明 (說明) shuōmíng to explain; to illustrate; explanation; directions; caption

item.Q:
Write the character: méi
(méiyǒu de méi)
item.A:
traditional: 沒
(negative prefix for verbs); have not; not
没有 (沒有) méiyǒu haven't; hasn't; doesn't exist; to not have; to not be

item.Q:
Write the character: mò
(mòshōu de mò)
item.A:
traditional: 沒
drowned; to end; to die; to inundate
没收 (沒收) mòshōu confiscate

item.Q:
Write the character: tā
(tāmen de tā)
item.A:
he; him
他们 (他們) tāmen they

item.Q:
Write the character: kàn
(kàndào de kàn)
item.A:
it depends; think; to see; to look at
看到 kàndào see (that); note

item.Q:
Write the character: kān
(kānchū de kān)
item.A:
to look after; to take care of; to watch; to guard
看出 kānchū to see

item.Q:
Write the character: nà
(nàme de nà)
item.A:
that; those; (commonly pronounced nèi before a classifier, esp. in Beijing)
那么 (那麼) nàme like that; in that way; or so; so; so very much; about; in that case

item.Q:
Write the character: nā
(dìlānā de nā)
item.A:
Na
地拉那 dìlānā Tirana

item.Q:
Write the character: wèn
(wèntí de wèn)
item.A:
traditional: 問
to ask
问题 (問題) wèntí question; problem; issue; topic

item.Q:
Write the character: shēng
(shēngchǎn de shēng)
item.A:
to be born; to give birth; life; to grow
生产 (生產) shēngchǎn to produce; manufacture

traditional: 沒有
méiyǒu haven't; hasn't; doesn't exist; to not have; to not be
jiùshì (emphasizes that something is precisely or exactly what is stated); precisely; exactly; even; if; just like; in the same way as
bùnéng cannot; must not; should not

traditional: 為了
wèile in order to; for the purpose of; so as to
wéile because of
yěshì also to be
yǐshàng more than; above; over; the above-mentioned
kěnéng might (happen); possible; probable; possibility; probability

traditional: 學生
xuésheng student; school child
kàndào see (that); note
hǎode (adj) OK

traditional: 以來
yǐlái since (a previous event)

traditional: 有時
yǒushí sometimes; now and then

traditional: 以為
yǐwéi to believe; to think; to consider erroneously; to assume (wrongly)

traditional: 那個
nàge that one
nàgè that one
nèigè that one

traditional: 就是說
jiùshìshuō in other words; that is

traditional: 文學
wénxué literature

traditional: 看來
kànlai apparently; it seems that; it appears; it seems

traditional: 大學
dàxué university

traditional: 那時
nàshí at that time

kànkan to take a look at; to examine; to survey; (coll.) pretty soon
kānkān to look
